## ShaderHelper.nonLinearDepthToLinear() method

Calculates the linear depth from non-linear depth

**Signature:**

```typescript
static nonLinearDepthToLinear(scope: PBInsideFunctionScope, depth: PBShaderExp, nearFar?: PBShaderExp): PBShaderExp;
```

</td></tr>

**Returns:**
